sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> put <radical>flowers</radical> on a <radical>cliff</radical>. That is their <radical>task</radical>. It is to <kanji>provide</kanji> and <kanji>equip</kanji> the cliff with flowers.
meaningInfo: Imagine a leader carrying flowers up to the top of a cliff. They are saying "I must provide more flowers to the cliff" as they climb up.
readingMnemonic: Why do they <kanji>provide</kanji> and <kanji>equip</kanji> the cliff with flowers? It's all for the <reading>bee</reading>s (<ja>び</ja>).
readingInfo: "The bees must be equipped with more flowers. I will provide these flowers for the bees!"
